pages.title: Totem of Undying
pages.text: Can save holders from death. It just has to be in your inventory. It is consumed in the process.

pages.title: Totem of Holding
pages.text: When you die, your items are automatically held in it. If you die again, all items will drop to the floor.

pages.title: Soul Compass
pages.text: You can find your death spot with a $(item)Soul Compass$(0).
